mapper.select:
select
from tb_user where login_name = #{loginName} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (user_id, login_name, password_md5, head_img_url, introduce, profession, address, create_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

user_id,

update tb_user

password_md5 = #{passwordMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
